mentions.candidate: Katy Gordon needs only a handful of extra votes to win.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The SNP and the Conservatives can't win here. Labour losing support.

contactInformation.address: Published and promoted by H. King on behalf of K. Gordon (Lib Dem), both at Lower Ground, 9B Marywood Square, Strathbungo G41 2BJ

images.caption: Handwritten text highlighting the close voter numbers in Glasgow North and advocating for tactical voting to elect Katy Gordon of the Lib Dems.

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. Just look at the figures - only Labour or Katy Gordon can win. So your vote could make the difference this time.
